name: Monster Mash
description: In a distant fairy-tale world, the villagers of Curly Valley are being attacked by legions of quirky and bizarre monsters. Fortify villages with various towers, upgrades and unusual defensive armaments to repel these mysterious invaders and protect the grateful villagers who cheer your every conquest!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista                    Processor: Pentium II 400Mhz or better (800 Mhz processor for Vista)                    Memory: 256 MB System RAM (512 MB for Vista)                    Graphics: Video Card with 32MB Video RAM (Graphics processor that is DirectX 10 capable for Vista)                    DirectX®: 7 or above                    Input Devices: Keyboard & mouse required. Joystick and game pad are not supported                    Sound:

reviews.review_text: It's like any other tower defense title out there, but the graphics are just hideous. Try out the other titles first.  [Rating: 63/100]
